summary:
Like playing as a Vampire? Hate having to contract the Sanguinare Vampiris diease? Well good news. This mod adds a new race into the game. The Vampire race. It has all the effects of the normal Sanguinare Vampiris. But now you can start right off as one.

Right now its only a Human vampire. But i do plan to add a Vampire race for all the default
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=green]I\'m taking a break from modding Skyrim to enjoy playing it and other real life issues. I may be back later to pick up work on my mods again.[/size][/color][/center]

[center][size=10][color=red]Vampire Race Mod V 1.0[/size][/color][/center]
[center][size=5][color=green]Please ENDORSE if you enjoy this mod![/size][/color][/center]
[CENTER][u]by Tyco1709[/u][/CENTER]
[center]Let me know of any issues or ideas you have to make this mod even better.
[url=http://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8351]Steam Workshop page.[/url][/center]

[center][img]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/4617/descriptionk.png[/img][/center]
Like playing as a Vampire? Hate having to contract the Sanguinare Vampiris diease? Well good news. This mod adds a new race into the game. The Vampire race. It has all the effects of the normal Sanguinare Vampiris. But now you can start right off as one.

Also added a new race called the Lycans. Im sure your wondering Lycans? Well im a huge fan of the underworld movies and since they added Werewolfs into the game i figured id make a race for them. I added a spell that allows you to transform into a Werewolf any time you chose too.

Right now its only a Human vampire. But i do plan to add a Vampire race for all the default races. Enjoy.

Fully works with any body mod you may have installed. But i plan to make it use DIMONIZED UNP female body.

[center][img]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/2482/installa.png[/img][/center]
Copy the archive content into your x:\\TESV Skyrim\\Data folder, when asked overwrite. Activate the esp in NMM (Nexus Mod Manager).

Or

Download with NMM and install it.

[center][img]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/9233/uninstall.png[/img][/center]
Just delete the ESP in

Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data


[center][img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/5193/todolistl.png[/img][/center]
+ Add a Vampire race for each of the default races in skyrim. Nord orc breton high elf dark elf etc etc

[center][img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/2596/changelog.png[/img][/center]
1.29.2012 - V 1.0 - First release.
2.7.2012 - v1.1 - Added Lycan race. Added spell to allow you to change into a were wolf when you want as a Lycan race. Feeding should work on Vampire race now.
2.10.2012 - V1.2 - Added vampire races for each default races.
 
[center][img]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/9058/creditsn.png[/img][/center]
Bethesda - Making Skyrim.
Nexus sites - Giving me a place to host and share my mod.
Skyedit team - Making such a usefull tool allowing me to do my mods.
Creation Kit - Being such a awesome tool.
author: Tyco1709

files.name: Varmpire Race 1-1
files.changelogHtml:
Added Lycan race.
Added spell to allow you to change into a were wolf when you want as a Lycan race.
Fixed feeding on vampire race.

files.name: Vampire and Lycan Race
files.changelogHtml: Added vampire races for all default races.
